lead_paragraph: Each November, the port city of Cartagena puts Colombia’s social inequalities on open display when it hosts the Independence Queen Contest and Miss Colombia.
snippet: Each November, the port city of Cartagena puts Colombia’s social inequalities on open display when it hosts the Independence Queen Contest and Miss Colombia.

headline.main: Dueling Beauty Pageants Put Income Gap on View
headline.seo: Colombia’s Beauty Pageants Put Income Gap on View
headline.print_headline: Dueling Beauty Pageants Put Income Gap on View

byline.contributor: Jenny Carolina González contributed reporting from Bogotá, Colombia.
